p: Next subsections contain the following: subsection 2.3 discusses the trend submodel weighting (which largely follows previous work), subsection 2.4 centers on the variability submodel weighting, section 2.5 discusses combining the component weights for each model, section 2.6 is dedicated to procedure for making weighted multi-model projections, and section 2.7 presents computational details on the implementation of the method.
